newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: UBS, WI Carr to issue warrants on Jardine units.
newsitem.headline: UBS, WI Carr to issue warrants on Jardine units.

text.p: Hong Kong-based Jardine Matheson and HongKong Land Holdings rallied to year highs on talk that two institutions were issuing call warrants on the companies, dealers said on Friday.
Union Bank of Switzerland and W.I Carr are said to the issuing call warrants on a basket of companies which include HongKong Land and Jardine Matheson.
W.I. Carr officials were not immediately available for comment while a UBS official said they would be issuing a statement after the market closes.
At 0855 GMT, HongKong Land was changing hands at US$3.02 after touching a year high of US$3.04. Volume was over 25 million shares.
Jardine Matheson was changing hands at US$8.25 after touching a new 1997 high of US$8.30. Volume was over 5.5 million shares.
